authors.name: Carolyn Edds
authors.affiliation: Eugene S. Pulliam research director, IRE/NICAR

title: Web sites for backgrounding people and businesses
description: List of websites for backgrounding people and businesses, including corporation records, experts, government agencies, high school websites, military, prisoner locators, professional licenses/certification, property records, public record directories on the web, search engines, telephone directories, vital records, and voter registration records.
